src:
Degenek: Nisu nas nadigrali ni za jedan gol, sve su postigli iz naših grešaka, neću da kažem kojih
“Imamo šanse da prezimimo u Evropi“, kaže Zvezdin štoper
07 Nov 2019 by Nenad Jovanović
Rezultat mnogo ubedljiviji no što je Crvena zvezda zaslužila, ali ishod kao ishod – apsolutno u skladu sa razlikom u kvalitetu. Objektivno, Totenhem je klasa iznad i beogradski revanš to je samo potvrdio, iako ostaje žal što crveno-beli nisu uspeli makar da zakuvaju. Jer šansi je bilo. I da je onaj jedan šut Milana Pavkova pri rezultatu 0:0 ušao sve bi izgledalo sasvim drugačije, uverava Miloš Degenek.“Imali smo tu Milanovu priliku na 0:0. Pa smo onda imali i šansu kod 1:0 za njih.  Nažalost, nismo ih iskoristili i to nas je koštalo svega. Sve bi bilo drugačije da smo poveli. Da je Pavkov dao za 1:0 verujem da nam oni ne bi dali gol. Mi bismo se kompaktno držali, bolje stajali, imali bi veći motiv i jaču podrsku navijača... Bila bi drugačija energija“, kaže Degenek.
Međutim, nije se desilo...“Ovako, oni su dali gol iz nekih naših polugrešaka i to je razlika između takvih ekipa. Imaju taj kvalitet u napadu i svaka im čast. Mislim da nas nisu nadigrali ni za jedan gol, već su ti golovi došli iz naših grešaka, loših postavljanja... Ipak, ponosan sam na našu ekipu, možemo iz ovoga dosta da naučimo. I dalje sve držimo u svojim rukama. Imamo šanse da prezimimo u Evropi. Moramo ga gledamo sebe i da budemo bolji u sledećoj utakmici protiv Bajerna“.
Za kraj i o onom nesrećnom prvom golu, potpuna konfuzija u Zvezdinoj odbrani. Ili ipak...“Kako da reaguješ kad ti lopta leti oko tebe 100 na sat? Nisu ni oni baš nesto dobro reagovali s obzirom koliko se lopta odbijala. Pokušali smo, ali nismo mogli bolje. Kod ostalih golova smo pogrešili par puta. Neću da kažem gde i šta, svi ste videli. Nismo odigrali kako smo mogli, ali neću da kazem da je neko bio bolji ili lošiji. Idemo zajedno dalje“, završio je Degenek.
(FOTO: Star Sport)
text:
Degenek: They didn't score us for any goal, they scored everything from our mistakes, I won't say which ones
"We have a chance of wintering in Europe," says Zvezdin's stopper
07 Nov 2019 by Nenad Jovanovic
The result is much more convincing than the Red Star deserved, but the outcome as an outcome - absolutely in line with the difference in quality. Objectively, Tottenham is the class above and the Belgrade rematch only confirmed it, though it remains regrettable that the red and whites failed to at least cook. Because chances were. And if that one shot from Milan Pavkov at the 0-0 score came in, it would look completely different, assures Milos Degenek. "We had this opportunity for Milan at 0-0. So then we had a 1-0 chance for them. Unfortunately, we didn't use them and it cost us everything. Everything would have been different had we led. If Pavkov had scored for 1: 0 I believe they would not have given us a goal. We would stick compactly, stand better, have a bigger motive and stronger support for the fans ... It would be a different energy, "Degenek says.
However, it did not happen ... ”Thus, they scored from some of our midfielders and that is the difference between such teams. They have that quality in attack and they have every honor. I don't think they outplayed us for any goals, but those goals came from our mistakes, poor layouts ... However, I'm proud of our team, we can learn a lot from this. We still hold everything in our hands. We have a chance to winter in Europe. We need to look at him and be better in the next game against Bayern. "
Finally, and about that unfortunate first goal, complete confusion in Star's defense. Or ... "How do you react when your ball is flying around you 100 per hour? They didn't respond well either, given how much the ball bounced. We tried, but we couldn't have done better. The other goals were a couple of times wrong. I will not say where and what, you all saw. We didn't play as well as we could, but I'm not saying that someone was better or worse. Let's go together, "Degenek finished.
(PHOTO: Star Sport)
